channel.title: New Graphics Card
channel.description:
I got this graphics card for my computer a while ago: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16814102873
When I play games it always crashes my PC. It says its the driver but I can't find any fixes to the problem. Since it's the holiday season my mom said she would buy this for me: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=14-125-383&SortField=0&SummaryType=0&Pagesize=10&PurchaseMark=&SelectedRating=5&VideoOnlyMark=False&VendorMark=&IsFeedbackTab=true&Keywords=%28keywords%29&Page=1#scrollFullInfo
I was just wondering if you guys think it will be compatible.
Specs: [code]CPU: AMD Phenom X4 955 Processor 3.2GHz (Not overclocked) Motherboard: ASRock M3A785GXH/128M AM3 AMD 785G HDMI ATX AMD Motherboard Video Card: Sapphire ATI Radeon HD 5770 1GB 128-bit GDDR5 PCI Express 2.1 x16 Memory: 4GB DDR3 1066 OS: Dual boot Windows 7 and Ubuntu 11.4[/code]
My PSU is 500W but I cba to find out what it is exactly right now(the company)

item.title: New Graphics Card
item.dc:creator: @sp11k3t3ht3rd sp11k3t3ht3rd
item.description:
@sp11k3t3ht3rd wrote:

I got this graphics card for my computer a while ago: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16814102873

When I play games it always crashes my PC. It says its the driver but I can’t find any fixes to the problem. Since it’s the holiday season my mom said she would buy this for me: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=14-125-383&SortField=0&SummaryType=0&Pagesize=10&PurchaseMark=&SelectedRating=5&VideoOnlyMark=False&VendorMark=&IsFeedbackTab=true&Keywords=(keywords)&Page=1#scrollFullInfo

I was just wondering if you guys think it will be compatible.

CPU: AMD Phenom X4 955 Processor 3.2GHz (Not overclocked) Motherboard: ASRock M3A785GXH/128M AM3 AMD 785G HDMI ATX AMD Motherboard Video Card: Sapphire ATI Radeon HD 5770 1GB 128-bit GDDR5 PCI Express 2.1 x16 Memory: 4GB DDR3 1066 OS: Dual boot Windows 7 and Ubuntu 11.4

My PSU is 500W but I cba to find out what it is exactly right now(the company)
